title: Ibihe byingenzi & Mentions - Urusengero rwa Orbital
heading: Ibikorwa by'ingenzi & Mentions
description: Ibi bihangano byimyaka myinshi nibice bya 13 bya Mercosul Bienal i Porto Alegre, Berezile, byateguwe na Marcelo Dantas. Yashyizwe ku rutonde rwigihembo cya Lumen 2022 - Igihembo kizaza. Yatsindiye kandi Icyiciro cya ArtSat cy'irushanwa rya CubeDesign 2021, ryatejwe imbere n'Ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi bw’ikirere cya Berezile (INPE).
